positions.subtitle: Pernod Ricard India
positions.description: • Headed a team of 30 workmen effectively in the bottling plant of capacity 1.5 Lakh cases/month• Spearheaded a Pan India project, increased the efficiency of 100 Pipers manufacturing line by 28%• Applied kaizen on Automated Lid Opener which increased safety, saved 1.2 Lakh INR per month• Designed and Developed a warehouse stock monitoring system, 20% reduction in dispatch time• Reduced downtime by 8%, Conducted Root Cause Analysis, Corrective and Preventive Action• Changeover time reduction by 10%, led a team of 4, implemented lean manufacturing process• Improved the quality parameters by 8%, formulated and implemented daily shift closure SOP• Responsible for the procurement of Inventory and prepared the Bill of Quantity estimation• Implemented periodic, preventive, scheduled and breakdown maintenance activities in the plant• Ensured the implementation of Total Quality Management, Plan Do Check Act tools, etc
positions.title: Executive Engineer
positions.description_html:
• Headed a team of 30 workmen effectively in the bottling plant of capacity 1.5 Lakh cases/month
• Spearheaded a Pan India project, increased the efficiency of 100 Pipers manufacturing line by 28%
• Applied kaizen on Automated Lid Opener which increased safety, saved 1.2 Lakh INR per month
• Designed and Developed a warehouse stock monitoring system, 20% reduction in dispatch time
• Reduced downtime by 8%, Conducted Root Cause Analysis, Corrective and Preventive Action
• Changeover time reduction by 10%, led a team of 4, implemented lean manufacturing process
• Improved the quality parameters by 8%, formulated and implemented daily shift closure SOP
• Responsible for the procurement of Inventory and prepared the Bill of Quantity estimation
• Implemented periodic, preventive, scheduled and breakdown maintenance activities in the plant
• Ensured the implementation of Total Quality Management, Plan Do Check Act tools, etc
